poem:
### Digital Echoes

In the cluttered halls of silicon,  
truth stumbles on code.  
Shadowed whispers weave,  
borne on winds of misinformation.  
Words turned sharp,  
piercing trust,  
like leaves fallen from a distrustful tree.

Amidst this storm,  
the soul stands alone,  
yearning for light  
in the flicker of corrupted screens.
